comment: Very diligent. It's a boring subject I must admit, but he is always there to make things clear. He takes attendance every single day but trust me...you don't want to miss class. Buy both of the textbooks, you use them everyday and WILL be lost without them. Be prepared to write essays and the test are all essay questions.
Willing to help if you attend class and at least act interested.

I LOVED THIS PROFESSOR! He was great! Don't miss class or you will miss a lot of info. He is very helpful and willing to do most anything to make sure you understand the material, but if you read what he tells you to you shouldn't have any problems. I finished with an A. Overall, a great class.

Nice guy. Read all material.do not miss class as you may miss out on important discussions. 2 take home essays and 2 in class essays which are not multiple choice, but question and answer format. Interesting teacher he is new to kennesaw.I suggest!

He is very helpful. Do not miss a class as you may miss information that is given on test. 2take home essays and 2 in class test. No multiple choice, just question and answer. Read all books, great interesting class, nice guy!
He is quite helpful and very diligent in helping make sure his students understand the material. But he doesn't know how to explain the material to his students. He is new but he has a long way to go
